body:
Comment 4 by **sdemingo**: 
I use the mouse to select the text and paste it. I select the whole line less the
comment prefix:

//fmt.Printf("hello\n")     ----->   [fmt.Printf("hello\n")]

Then I paste it using the middle botton. The text is pasted and emacs hangs. I'm using
emacs 23.1.1 on Lucid too.
